column6: two foreigners came to the office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office to ask the immigration police for help to return to their country. They have both over stayed their visa and have no money to pay.------ The two foreign nationals were named as ALBERT KUPRIENKO
column7: a 24-year-old Russian male who arrived in the Kingdom of Cambodia on June 21
column10: a 31 year old Russian who arrived on December 1st  2017 (residency visa expired on 21 July 2018).------The foreigners were sent to the  Department of Immigration for procedures.------General Department of Immigration
